data.title: LPCPL Exchange
data.text:
A variety of equipment, technology, and tools are available in the Exchange Makerspace for sewing, woodworking, fabrication, creating, and more. To use the equipment, complete an in-person training, then come back and use the equipment on your own.

Exchange studios offer tools to record podcasts, music, or other audio tracks; record videos or create professional photos; and mix or edit in an acoustic friendly space. After an initial one-on-one introductory class, studio spaces are reservable by certified makers, ages 12 and up.

A large Classroom and small Study Rooms are available for reservation. The Classroom has a large projection screen, flexible table and chairs set up, and kitchenette. Study rooms are suitable for quiet study and include a computer with camera/microphone for online conferences.
